author: Henri
content:
What’s the difference between condescending & rip off’, ? This place does it in abundance….absolutely not worth it’ and the flavours are basic’ I know, l stayed in Penang for 6 months.
But’ others are much much better’ get this’, while l was there, a customer was complaining about the spice’ hahahahhaah, she asked to scrape it off the chicken….they did’ sums it up.
Work, with your customers’ educate them about Thai food and make it inclusive, you’ll be surprised by the increase of custom.
